channel.title: Hillspk
channel.description:
[b][size=10pt]welcome to Hillspk![/size][/b]
[b][size=10pt]Client download - https://www.dropbox.com/s/8khfop6rxg7kksx/Hillspk.jar?dl=0[/size][/b]
[b]forums - hillspk.smfnew.com[/b]
[b][size=16pt]Why You should join:[/size][/b] [b]We have a good econonomy going , there are many bosses like Sea troll queen , Nomad, Giant Sea Snake , Avatar of Destruction and many more! The exp rate is set just right so its not to fast but not to slow, we have friendly staff , players, we are looking to expand, so join now today! [/b]
Yes we are looking for staff but please do not beg! [b]Owner - Owner Jacob[/b]
[b]Admin- Empty[/b] [b]Admin-Empty[/b]
[b]Mod-Empty[/b] [b]Mod- Empty[/b] [b]Mod-Empty[/b]
[b][size=15pt]Features[/size][/b] -100% uptime -Dicing -All Tzhaar waves -Money Pouch -Clan chat + Lootshare -Donate Island -Dungeoneering -Imbued items And many more!
[b]Pictures:[/b] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/99nggm.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2zzouuw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/30cp1li.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/bds9l0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/14jmeyq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/280s74z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/8vrj3t.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/zxmejb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/n4imtg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/xfu8h4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/10nfd5k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2r7mufk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/30nafkw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/beh99x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2i04qol.png[/img]

item.title: Hillspk
item.dc:creator: @paulvereline paulvereline
item.description:
@paulvereline wrote:

Horrible server. The second i log in i got ip banned. I went ahead to change my ip and log back in to ask why he ip banned me and he just ip banned me again. Nothing but a typical leech even still has the acheron background from the acheron source. Definitely a thumbs down and i do not recommend playing this server. Even the jar takes forever to download.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hills20 wrote:

Oh people still act immature and try to bring someones server down? I thought that was 4 years ago (lol)

Read full topic
